Articles.Content:
So i got little bored and decided that making kerbals to sims would be quite hilarious. Orginaly i thought the gameplay would be quite boring but somehowe my kerbals started to find them self in quite weird situations. Now the kerbals don't look so much like they do in the game but that is because of the limitations wich sims character creater has, like being unable to make them dwarfs.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QhIw87tU5b0
